oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Johnson Cleaners adds another truck, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the new delivery truck of Johnson Cleaners. The truck and driver are pictured in front of the Parthenon in Centennial Park. The 1941 City Directory cites businessman Edwin C. Johnson, with addresses at 101 29th Avenue N and br 400 8th Avenue S. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson Cleaners (Nashville, Tenn.)
